data.similar:
HTML::Template PDF::Template

  rationale:

    I wanted to keep with the *::Template naming scheme. I am working
    on Graph::Template (based on the same class structure, but
    interfacing GD::Graph) and it will be ready for beta release by the
    end of 11/2003. I have also just taken over maintainership of
    PDF::Template and will be releasing the next version of that at the
    same time as Graph::Template-0.01
data.Rationale: There are currently no templating modules going against
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wanted to keep with the *::Template naming scheme. I am working
    on Graph::Template (based on the same class structure, but
    interfacing GD::Graph) and it will be ready for beta release by the
    end of 11/2003. I have also just taken over maintainership of
    PDF::Template and will be releasing the next version of that at the
    same time as Graph::Template-0.01

    Rationale: There are currently no templating modules going against
    Excel, especially not using HTML::Template's data structure. Using
    these modules has reduced my personal deployment and maintenance
    times by over 50%, in the relevant subsystems.
